text: <@U0107A7161E> it is a standalone initiative. here in EU cloud infrustructure is not widely adopted yet, for that reason we were unable to participate in the hackathon. it is a java + angular application. the specification can be founf here <https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amenski/covid19-Rest-api/develop/src/main/resources/images/spec.png|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amenski/covid19-Rest-api/develop/src/main/resources/images/spec.png>

text: Thanks, Amanuel! l think your skills would be very helpful for the ongoing hackathon. If you have time, here is the list of tasks: <https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C010695DKMM/p1585457882091300>

attachments.fallback:
[March 28th, 2020 9:58 PM] sefanittades: We’re officially ~23 hours away from the end of the first #ethiohackscovid19 and the beginning of the Weekend Hackathon pitches!

Quick update on the teams and what they need below. If you haven’t gotten involved yet, *it’s not too late*! What better way to spend your Sunday than creating some COVID things?! Head over here to sign up for a team :point_right::skin-tone-5: <http://bit.ly/ethiohackscovid19>. Please DM the team’s lead(s) for more info OR click on the name of the team to join that <!channel>! :sunglasses:

<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C0106BWK8AX|Dashboard> - unified internal dashboard that shows real-time data on COVID-19 cases
• Lead: <@U01078QCG2C>
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C0104AYA6SX|CI/CD> - creating a streamlined process to deploy code using really cool AWS tooling - containers, Code Build, Code Pipeline, CloudFormation
• Lead: <@UV6JHDP0S>
<https://join.slack.com/share/I010YSXSWJU/tN0hka51xaD3TXdH4aFxoPsH/enQtMTAzMjkxNTkxNDY0MC0yNDVmMWI2ZGM5N2E0ZTI1OWZiNzhhMDEzZTI2OGJjMTEzYTI4OTQ0N2VlMTcyODM3MTczM2U5YmU1NGMzN2I5|API> - creating a single beautiful API to rule them all for critical systems to access and push data- forms, dashboards, bots, SMS
• Lead: <@U0107JEKN0N> 
• `*HELP NEEDED:* With creating/tweaking endpoints using Node.js / AWS Lambda / DynamoDB`
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C010GQS9HNY|Testing/QA> - ensuring critical forms for travelers and the general public actually work!
• Lead: <@UVC2L182V>
<https://join.slack.com/share/I010YCJLM44/rpBSupgCBKsT0vvnHzdz6yAF/enQtMTAzMjQyNjcwMTE0MC00ZGE4OWRlNjFkN2FlOTczYmY1ZjA2M2QwZWYxMDgxOTA3NTM5ZjUyM2IzOWVjOWJhODNjNWVjYzU0YWQzMjIw|Hotel Vacancy Project> - creating a bot to show hotel vacancies for travelers that need to be quarantined
• Lead: <@U010MHWSRPH>
• `*HELP NEEDED:* To help create a Telegram bot`
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/CVBQ5H16D|Content> - creating MOH-approved content and assets to raise awareness about COVID-19
• Leads: <@UVALWD1MG> + <@U010CLFURT8>
• `*HELP NEEDED: S*omeone with video/audio experience that can help us create content about COVID-19`
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/CV8GEDED8|Influencer/Media Marketing> - partnering with influencers to spread MOH-approved content for COVID-19 awareness
• Lead: <@U0106M26108> 
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C010GQUEBSQ|DIY Gear> - creating protective gear for medical professionals and the public
• Lead: <@U0107JERE9L>
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C010W2ZJN6L|Medicine/Grocery Delivery> - partnering with established delivery services in Addis and helping with logistics and project management
• Lead: <@U010B7Q6XE0>
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C010VNXB4H2|Quarantine Center Development> - retrofitting older existing buildings like schools & hotels to become quarantine centers
• Lead: <@UVB9ZSPCH> + Association of Ethiopian Architects
<https://ethiopia-covid19.slack.com/archives/C010P7122SD|Volunteer Training> - mobilizing and training community volunteers on the ground
• Lead: <@U010B22ESES>

We’re officially ~23 hours away from the end of the first #ethiohackscovid19 and the beginning of the Weekend Hackathon pitches!

Quick update on the teams and what they need below. If you haven’t gotten involved yet, *it’s not too late*! What better way to spend your Sunday than creating some COVID things?! Head over here to sign up for a team :point_right::skin-tone-5: <http://bit.ly/ethiohackscovid19>. Please DM the team’s lead(s) for more info OR click on the name of the team to join that <!channel>! :sunglasses:
